sourceDesc.p: Museum of New Zealand—Te Papa Tongarewa MU000094/003/0298

front.p: 1877 November 7: to Gore Museum of New Zealand—Te Papa Tongarewa MU000094/003/0298

body.p: I have the honour to ask the New Zealand Institute to be pleased to grant me a set of volumes (ix in number) of the “Transactions” of the Institute:—under section f. of clause 5 of “Abstract of Rules, &c.”—
I want them for the Public Library in Penzance, Mount’s Bay, Cornwall, England, and will, on receiving them, send you a P.O.O. for the amount.
If convenient, I should like to receive them early, so as to send them to England per one of our first wool-ships hence.—
I have the honour to be,
